IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE SMALL BUSINESS ASSOCIATION OF MICHIGAN'S MISSION IS TO HELP MICHIGAN SMALL BUSINESSES SUCCEED.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE SMALL BUSINESS ASSOCIATION OF MICHIGAN'S MISSION IS TO HELP MICHIGAN SMALL BUSINESSES SUCCEED.
IRS990.Desc: FULL-TIME LEGISLATIVE SUPPORT: COMMUNICATE ABOUT PROPOSED PUBLIC POLICY AND REGULATORY MATTERS OF CONCERN TO MICHIGAN'S SMALL BUSINESS COMMUNITY TO A VARIETY OF AUDIENCES INCLUDING THE MICHIGAN LEGISLATURE AND BUSINESS REGULATORS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: OFFER COMMUNICATIONS TOOLS SUCH AS NEWSLETTERS, WEBSITES, AND A MAGAZINE TO THE SMALL BUSINESS COMMUNITY. THESE TOOLS ARE USED TO INFORM SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS ABOUT LEGISLATIVE AND REGULATORY MATTERS IN ADDITION TO PROVIDING INFORMATION TO HELP EDUCATE SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS ABOUT A VARIETY OF BUSINESS OPERATIONS TOPICS. 31,279 MEMBERS BENEFITED FROM THE ASSOCIATION'S PROGRAMS DURING THE FISCAL YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN THE PREPARATION OF TAX RETURNS, TAX POSITIONS ARE TAKEN BASED ON INTERPRETATION OF FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL INCOME TAX LAWS. MANAGEMENT PERIODICALLY REVIEWS AND EVALUATES THE STATUS OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND MAKES ESTIMATES OF AMOUNTS, INCLUDING INTEREST AND PENALTIES, ULTIMATELY DUE OR OWED. NO AMOUNTS HAVE BEEN IDENTIFIED, OR RECORDED, AS UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL RETURNS GENERALLY REMAIN OPEN FOR EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES FOR A PERIOD OF THREE TO FOUR YEARS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS A 100% MEMBER ORGANIZATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED BY A VOTE OF A MAJORITY OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRESENT AND VOTING AT THE LAST MEETING OF THE FISCAL YEAR. PROXY VOTING SHALL NOT BE ALLOWED FOR PURPOSES OF ELECTING DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE, THE COO, AND THE CEO.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS ARE ASKED TO SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM ANNUALLY. FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT & CEO AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE INFORMED THE BOARD OF ITS DETERMINATION (THERE WERE NO CONFLICTS) AT A MEETING ON OCTOBER 19, 2022. A CONFLICTED DIRECTOR SHALL BE RECUSED FROM PARTICIPATING IN DEBATES AND VOTING ON HIS OR HER CONFLICT OF INTEREST. BOARD MEMBERS MAY ABSTAIN FROM VOTING ON CERTAIN ISSUES IF A CONFLICT EXISTS AND ANY RELATIONSHIP WITH A BOARD MEMBER THAT ALSO MAY BE A VENDOR IS REVEALED BEFORE ENGAGING IN BUSINESS WITH THAT BOARD MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS RETAINED AN OUTSIDE INDEPENDENT CONSULTANT TO DEVELOP AND MANAGE A FORMAL SALARY ADMINISTRATION SYSTEM. HE UTILIZES DATA FROM A VARIETY OF SOURCES SUCH AS ASAE AND SALARY SURVEYS AND OTHER INDUSTRY SPECIFIC TOOLS TO ESTABLISH PAY GRADES AND ZONES. THIS DATA IS UPDATED ANNUALLY. ALL STAFF SALARIES ARE DETERMINED BASED ON THIS DATA. THE PRESIDENT AND CEO HAS AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATION CONDUCTED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND REPORTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE PRESIDENT & CEO PERFORMANCE EVALUATION FOR THE 22-23 FISCAL YEAR WAS CONDUCTED ON AUGUST 2, 2023. SALARY ADJUSTMENTS WERE MADE EFFECTIVE WITH THE JULY 15TH, 2023 PAYROLL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE FEDERAL LAWS AND IRS RULES. REQUESTS HAVE BEEN INFREQUENT, BUT TYPICALLY THE DOCUMENTS ARE COPIED AND MAILED TO THE REQUESTOR WITHIN THE REQUIRED TIMELINE.

IdRelatedOrgTxblCorpTrGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: MANAGEMENT AND SALES OF PRODUCTS AND SERVICES
